query: select id, location from nyc_homicides_copy where FD_distance($P, location) < 1000 order by dis;
select id, location from nyc_homicides_copy where FD_Contains(ST_GeomFromText(LINESTRING (poly_point_set)), location);
select id, loaction from nyc_homicides_copy where k  > (select count(*)  from nyc_homicides_copy where FD_DWithin($P, location, FD_Distance($P, location))
